title: Part 296 - Withholding Of Tax
content:
Part 296 - Withholding Of Tax

State Regulations
§ 296.1 - Requirement of withholding tax from wages
§ 296.2 - Determining New York City earnings tax on nonresidents to be withheld
§ 296.3 - Certificate of nonresidence and apportionment of wages for services within and without the City of New York
§ 296.4 - Employer's returns and payment of withheld taxes
§ 296.5 - Information statement for employee
§ 296.6 - Credit for tax withheld in a taxable year of less than 12 months

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
